articles.title: 'Fortune favours the brave': Hamish McLennan bullish on rugby's future - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The new Rugby Australia chairman wasted no time outlining a bold agenda for the ailing game, but he faces significant challenges delivering it.
articles.content:
